name: *1 BUNDLE DEAL, BRAZILIAN, MALAYSIAN, INDIAN & PERUVIAN*
description:
1 BUNDLE DEAL THIS IS FOR ALL TEXTURE OF HAIR BRAZILIAN INDIAN MALAYSIAN PERUVIAN WHEN CHECKING OUT PLEASE LEAVE A NOTE ON YOUR ORDER TELLING US WHAT KIND YOU WANT OR EMAIL US KISSBYNORENO @GMAIL.COM

IF YOU MAKE AN ORDER USING A CREDIT & DEBIT CARD, OR PAYPAL ACCOUNT. PLEASE SEND US AN EMAIL IMMEDIATELY AFTER YOU PLACE YOUR ORDER STATING THAT I __________ CERTIFY THAT I AM AUTHORIZE TO USE THIS CARD ENDING IN ___ OR PAYPAL ACCOUNT WHICH IS ____. PLEASE PUT THE LAST 4 DIGITS OF THE CARD OR THE PAYPAL EMAIL. FAILURE TO DUE SO WILL RESULT A DELAY OF YOUR ORDER. MEANING WE WILL NOT PROCESS AND SHIP UNTIL WE RECEIVE THIS CONFIRMATION!! THANK YOU FOR UNDERSTANDING . Our hair is 100% Hair. Machine Weft Natural color 1b Minimal to no shedding 95-100grams per bundle 3.5-4oz per bundle Cuticle is intact & follows one direction Comes in Body Wave, & Straight. Our hair is unprocessed virgin hair meaning that it can be bleached, dyed or relaxed. Color and process at your own risk. We ask that you seek a licensed cosmetologist when doing this. We assume no liability or responsibility for errors or inaccuracies when altering your hair. Please make sure you double check your order before checking out. If you have any questions please email us at kissbynoreno@gmail.com or call 678-883-2479 If no one answer please send a text message.

All hair is 100% Unprocessed Pure Virgin Indian Hair. 
 
 Lengths:
 10" - 32".
 
Color: 
Natural Black & Brown Only 
(Our Virgin hair is never Chemically processed so, 
only natural colors available. 
The hair may be dyed by a Professional Stylist.)
 
 Texture: 
Wave texture varies from bundle to bundle as 
the waves are naturally occuring patterns and have not be chemically manipulated or engineered in anyway.
 
Weight:
 Each wefted bundle weighs approximately 4 ounces.
 
*Appx 6-8 ounces (Two bundles) 
are needed for Full Sew in Hair extensions 
with lengths of 10-16 inches.
*Appx 9-12 ounces (three bundles) 
are needed with lengths longer than 16 inches. 

_______________

name: Mongolian Kinky Curly (3 Bundle)
description:
This beautiful and natural kinky curly texture has been specially created from Virgin Mongolian hair, undergoing a natural process to create soft but kinky and coarse curls without chemicals or color.  The cuticle is fully in tact and the color is still in its virgin state which keeps the integrity of the hair despite the kinky texture and ensures longevity.  This hair has the ability and versatility to be colored and styled to your preference while returning back to its curly state.   With proper styling the hair can be worn curly, or straight.


*Please note heat styling over long periods of time may loosen the curl pattern of the hair.


**Please account for shrinkage (the amount of length lost when in curly state) when ordering.

***Please note due to the texture of the hair we strongly recommend you sealing your wefts  as kinky curly hair requires sealing to maintain its integrity.

***Please note Kinky curly hair requires daily maintenance and moisture, it is not recommended for those without experience caring for kinky hair. It is considered high maintenance hair.
Please note that from lengths 10"-16" the curl is softer curl. From 18"-26" the curl will be tighter. 5AAAAA

It takes 72 hours for payment to be process up to 10 business days for shipping.

Our hair is unprocessed virgin hair meaning that it can be bleached, dyed or relaxed. Color and process at your own risk. We ask that you seek a licensed cosmetologist when doing this. We assume no liability or responsibility for errors or inaccuracies when altering your hair.

Please make sure you double check your order before checking out. If you have any questions or want to have all same lengths please email us at kissbynoreno@gmail.com or call 678-883-2479 If no one answer please send a text message.
